text.name: Hundred-Footed Death Maggot [蝍蛆殺]
text.desc: [EndSkill] Inflict [CentipedePoison] equal to the sum of the types of negative effects on self and the main target (max 5)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 4+ Gluttony or Gloom Reson., inflict [CentipedePoison] by Reson. (max 4)

passiveList.name: Reversal Death by Gu Poison
passiveList.desc:
Whenever this unit inflicts [Sinking] Potency, [Sinking] Count, or 'Unique Sinking' using its Attack Skills, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (max 2)
- At 3+ A-Reson., with the same conditionals, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn instead (max 3)
